price: Ey İman edenler! Oruç, sizden öncekilere farz kılındığı gibi, Allah’a karşı takva sahibi olursunuz diye size de farz kılındı.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ كُتِبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū kutiba ʿalaykumu al-ṣiyāmu kamā kutiba ʿalā alladhīna min qablikum laʿallakum tattaqūna
